definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

sentences.english: This paper introduces the design of press shaping mould for belt fastener of mine belt conveyor.
sentences.chinese: 介绍矿用带式输送机皮带扣冲压成型模具的设计。

sentences.english: Pop big buckle, we had many wood look colorway for choice or make your own color.
sentences.chinese: 特大皮带扣，有多种木纹可供选购，亦可跟来色做货。

sentences.english: The wristband has a velcro strap clasp.
sentences.chinese: 袖口有魔术贴的皮带扣。

sentences.english: She buckled herself into her seat.
sentences.chinese: 她坐进自己座位，将皮带扣好。

sentences.english: The company set all kinds of belt buckle design and production in one.
sentences.chinese: 本公司集各类皮带扣的设计和生产于一体。

sentences.english: Double breasted button up front with detachable tie belt.
sentences.chinese: 双排扣前可拆卸领带皮带扣。

sentences.english: The buckle is held with a screw.
sentences.chinese: 皮带扣被赞同一个螺丝钉。

sentences.english: The officer belted his sword on.
My belt buckle slips inside the windowsill.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮带扣滑到窗沿里面了。

sentences.english: Look at the way the buckles offset the pattern.
sentences.chinese: 注意看皮带扣与花纹的搭配。

sentences.english: The simplest quiver is a tube and a belt clip.
sentences.chinese: 最简单的箭壶就是一个筒加一个皮带扣。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
variant of 紐扣|纽扣[niu3 kou4]
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
